sqlMap.select: SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT G.land_prt_at_code GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, G.land_assets_cd GIS_ASSETS_CD, G.land_assets_sub_cd GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', G.LAND_PRT_AT_CODE) GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NM, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD, GAM_GETLOCCDNAME(G.LAND_PRT_AT_CODE, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD)) GIS_ASSETS_LOC_NM, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_NM) GIS_ASSETS_NM, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC) GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM) GIS_ASSETS_LNM, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB) GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR) GIS_ASSETS_AR, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI) GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI, COUNT(ENTRPSCD) COMP_CNT, case when count(R.ENTRPSCD)=1 THEN MAX(R.ENTRPS_NM) ELSE '전체' END ENTRPS_NM, SUM(R.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_V G, ( SELECT D.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, D.GIS_ASSETS_CD, D.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, A.ENTRPSCD, gam_getentrpsnm(A.ENTRPSCD, '1') ENTRPS_NM, SUM(D.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A,ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F D WHERE 1=1 AND TO_DATE('2015-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') > D.usage_pd_to AND TO_DATE('2015-12-30', 'YYYY-MM-DD') > D.usage_pd_from GROUP BY D.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, D.GIS_ASSETS_CD, D.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, A.ENTRPSCD ) R WHERE 1=1 AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=R.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=R.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=R.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND G.land_prt_at_code='622' AND G.land_assets_cd='LMM' AND G.land_assets_sub_cd='01' GROUP BY g.land_prt_at_code, g.land_assets_cd, g.land_assets_sub_cd ) S ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM (SELECT * FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = 'L') G LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRMISN_YN='Y' AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT
A.ENTRPS_NM LIKE '%' || #entrpsNm# || '%'
TO_DATE(#searchDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO+1
GROUP BY B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) C ON C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND C.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1=1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD = #gisAssetsLocCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = #gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_CNT , SUM(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR) SUM_AR , SUM(G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR) SUM_RENT_AR , SUM(C.USAGE_AR) SUM_USAGE_AR , SUM(C.FEE) SUM_FEE , SUM(C.RDCXPT_FEE) SUM_RDCXPT_FEE FROM (SELECT * FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F WHERE GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = 'L') G LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRMISN_YN='Y' AND A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT
A.ENTRPS_NM LIKE '%' || #entrpsNm# || '%'
TO_DATE(#searchDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO+1
GROUP BY B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) C ON C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND C.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1=1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD = #gisAssetsLocCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = #gisAssetsPrprtySeCd#

SELECT MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_CD) GIS_ASSETS_CD, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_NM) GIS_ASSETS_NM, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR) GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR) GIS_ASSETS_AR, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC) GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM) GIS_ASSETS_LNM, MAX(G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB) GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B, GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT AND A.PRMISN_YN='Y' AND B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD=G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD AND B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#PRT_CD# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#ASSETS_CD# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#ASSETS_SCD# AND TO_DATE(#searchDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO

SELECT GAM_GETENTRPSNM(A.entrpscd, '1') entrps_nm, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE 1=1 and a.mng_year=B.mng_year and a.mng_no=B.mng_no and a.mng_cnt=B.mng_cnt AND A.PRMISN_YN='Y' AND B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#PRT_CD# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#ASSETS_CD# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#ASSETS_SCD# AND TO_DATE(#searchDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO GROUP BY A.entrpscd
